Description: Randomize your in-game name! Find the appropriate files in ModFolders. Delete files to reset names.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Use Suffixes & Titles
CheckboxSettings.Description: Whether or not to use suffixes and titles. Only works with complex names.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Chance of Title (%)
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a title being included in the name.

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Chance of Suffix (%)
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a suffix being included in the name.

DropdownSettings.Name: Name Format
DropdownSettings.Description: Which format to use when generating names. Simple names are made of one part, whereas complex names are composed of a first and a last name.
